data.text: Digau Israel huogodoo ga hagatanga i di Anggowaa o Sin, ga taele gi di gowaa nei mo di gowaa nei, mai nnelekai o Dimaadua gi digaula, gaa dau i Rephidim ga haga duu nadau hale laa i golo, di gowaa deelaa la ono wai inu ai.
Gei digaula gaa hai nadau donu gi Moses boloo, “Goe haga inumia gimaadou.”
Digaula gu hieinu gaa tamu a Moses boloo, “Goe ne laha mai gimaadou nogo i Egypt laa i aha? Goe ne laha mai gimaadou belee daaligi gimaadou mo madau dama mo madau manu gii mmade?”
Gei Moses ga dalodalo hagamahi gi Dimaadua, “Au gaa hai dagu aha gi digau aanei? Digaula e hoohoo hua ga dilidili au.”
Dimaadua ga helekai gi Moses, “Gahia mai nia dagi o digau Israel, hula goodou i mua digau Israel. Kae ina dau dogodogo dela nogo hagamaawa di monowai Nile.

Au ga duu laa i oo mua i hongo di Gonduu Sinai, gei goe ga hagamaawa tadugalaa, gei nia wai gaa hali mai, e inu ai nia daangada.” Gei Moses gaa hai hua nia mee aanei hagammaa i mua nia dagi o digau Israel.

Di gowaa deelaa gu haga ingoo bolo ‘Massah’ mo ‘Meribah’17.7 Massah mo Meribah: Nia ingoo e lua aanei le hai nau lee i nnelekai Hebrew boloo “hagamada” mo “tamu”  i digau Israel ne hai tamu gei gu hagamada a Dimaadua gi di nadau heeu boloo, “Dimaadua la i tadau baahi be hagalee?”
Digau Amalek ne lloomoi ga heebagi gi digau Israel i Rephidim.
Gei Moses ga helekai gi Joshua, “Hilia au daane, e hula e heebagi gi digau Amalek daiaa. Au gaa duu laa i hongo di gonduu deelaa, e daahi togodogo hagamadagu a God.”
Gei Joshua gaa hana ga heebagi gi digau Amalek be nia helekai a Moses ne hai, gei Moses mo Aaron mo Hur guu hula gi hongo di gonduu deelaa.
Malaa, di waalooloo o Moses e daahi ono lima gi nua, gei digau Israel ga heebagi maaloo, gei mee ma gaa dugu ono lima gi lala, gei digau Amalek ga heebagi maaloo.

Nia lima o Moses ma ga maanu, gei ogo Aaron mo Hur ga gaamai di nau hadugalaa, ga haga noho a Moses gi nonua, gei meemaa gaa tuu i baahi o mee, e daahi nia lima o maa gi nua, gaa dae loo gi di laa ga ulu.
Gei Joshua gu daaligi digau Amalek huogodoo i di hai deenei ne hai.

Dimaadua ga helekai gi Moses, “Hihia di mee deenei gi lodo di beebaa e hai di mee haga langahia. Gei goe gi haga iloo ina gi Joshua bolo Au ga hagammaa digau Amalek gi hagalee.”17.14 Deuteronomy 25.17-19; 1 Samuel 15.2-9
Moses ga haga duu dana gowaa hai tigidaumaha i di gowaa deelaa, ga haga ingoo boloo ‘Yihowah Nissi’17.15 Yihowah Nissi di ingoo deenei dono hadinga boloo, “Dimaadua la go dagu Hagallebe”.
mo di helekai, “Dahi aga ina gi nua tagallebe o Dimaadua, gei Dimaadua la ga heebagi gi digau Amalek ga hana hua dee odi!”
